name: Picturesque Nayarit
description: On this all day tour you will drive out of the hustle and bustle of Puerto Vallarta and into the tranquil highlands of Jalisco. The quaint villages and green rolling hills will amaze you. We will head into the magnificent Sierra Madre Mountain range and drive 3,000 feet above sea level to the historic town of Compostela. Once we arrive here we will explore the regional museum of anthropology.
